moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather ARP Scanner
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This Module will perform an ARP scan for a given IP range through a
          Meterpreter Session.
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target address range or CIDR identifier
